document.full_text: michel barnier, the european commissioner for the internal market and services, calls for trans-atlantic unity on financial regulation ahead of a meeting with treasury secretary timothy f. geithner.
document.title: european regulator criticizes u.s. on banker bonuses
lines_and_colors: michel barnier, the european commissioner for the internal market and services, calls for trans-atlantic unity on financial regulation ahead of a meeting with treasury secretary timothy f. geithner.
